name: Hall of Mirrors
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You scatter ethereal mirrors all over a 60 foot radius around yourself. While in this area, when you are attacked, attacking creatures must roll 1d20 first. On a roll of 15 or lower, they strike at a mirror image of yourself and do no damage to you.

Creatures you damage ignore this effect on their next turn.

The spell ends if you leave the area.
